Package estimation.util

Class HumanInput

java.lang.Object
estimation.util.HumanInput
public class HumanInput
extends java.lang.Object
Class with static methods to handle the human player's actions.

    • HumanInput

      public HumanInput()

  • Method Details

    • isLegalBid

      public static boolean isLegalBid​(int tempInt, int bidNotPossible, int dealerIndex) throws IllegalMoveException
      Method that check if player's bid is legal.
      Parameters:
      tempInt - the player's bid.
      bidNotPossible - the bid that the player cannot make.
      dealerIndex - the index of a player who is also a dealer.
      Returns:
      a boolean indicating that the player's bid is legal.
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - if player's bid is not legal.

    • placeBid

      public static int placeBid​(int numberOfTricks, int totalBidsThusFar, int dealerIndex)
      Method that handles human input for placing a bid.
      Parameters:
      numberOfTricks - the round's number of tricks.
      totalBidsThusFar - the total of all the bids already placed by players in the trick.
      dealerIndex - the index of a player who is also a dealer.
      Returns:
      an integer representing the player's bid.

    • promptPlayerCardInput

      public static int promptPlayerCardInput​(Hand hand)
      Method that prompts human input for playing a card.
      Parameters:
      hand - the player's hand.
      Returns:
      the player's selected card.

    • isLegalMove

      public static boolean isLegalMove​(java.util.List<Card> playedThusFar, Card card, boolean leadExists, boolean trumpExists, Suit leadSuit, Suit trumpSuit) throws IllegalMoveException
      Method that check if player's move is legal.
      Parameters:
      playedThusFar - a list of cards already played in the trick.
      card - the player's selected card.
      leadExists - a boolean indicating if lead suit card(s) exist in the player's hand.
      trumpExists - a boolean indicating if trump suit card(s) exist in the player's hand.
      leadSuit - the trick's lead suit.
      trumpSuit - the round's trump suit.
      Returns:
      a boolean indicating that the player's move is legal.
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - if player's move is not legal.

    • playCard

      public static Card playCard​(Player player, java.util.List playedThusFar, Suit trumpSuit)
      Method that handles human input for playing a card. Includes error checking for negative/non-integers. Ensures that the player does not play a non-lead suit card if he has a lead suit card. If there is no lead suit card in the player's hand, ensures that the player does not play a non-trump suit card if he has a trump suit card.
      Parameters:
      player - a Player object representing the human player.
      playedThusFar - a list of cards already played in the trick.
      trumpSuit - the round's trump suit.
      Returns:
      the player's selected card.
